sentences.en: But the term is a catchall for multiple techniques to handle elements like typography, graphics and video.
sentences.cn: 但是这个术语涵义很广，也指处理排印、图像和视频等元素的多种技术。

sentences.en: Experimental typography and functional typography are, up to a certain point, opponents of each other.
sentences.cn: 试验性排版和功能性排版是相互对立的.

sentences.en: For this image I used a mixture of stock imagery, drawings, textures, typography and photos.
sentences.cn: 我参看了一堆图片素材库 、 素描 、 材质 、 印刷品和照片.

sentences.en: Jobs developed an appreciation for typography, the style and arrangement of printed characters.
sentences.cn: 乔布斯渐渐喜欢上排印术——打印字符的版面设计与安排。

sentences.en: Knowledge of layout , graphic design fundamentals, typography, and animation.
sentences.cn: 有版面设计 、 平面设计 、 排版及动画制作方面的知识.

sentences.en: Lettering: Hand - drawn typography or a typeface designed to look hand - drawn.
sentences.cn: 绘画字: 手工绘画的字体,或像绘画出来的印刷字体.

sentences.en: Love Typography , devoted to fonts typefaces and all things typographical.
sentences.cn: 研究关于所有字体,字形以及排版的设计.

sentences.en: Main Idea: Typography is young, but will continue to be a part of web design.
sentences.cn: 核心创意: 字体设计比较新, 但是会逐步成为网页设计的一部分!

sentences.en: Please write your name in typography.
sentences.cn: 请用印刷体写下你的姓名.

sentences.en: Specimen: Sample page set to show the typography.
sentences.cn: 样本: 预示排字格式的一页稿样.

sentences.en: The core of inventing engraving typography, a great technological invention, is the invention of its theory.
sentences.cn: 雕版印刷术发明的核心是雕版印刷术原理的发明.雕版印刷术是一项伟大的科技发明.

sentences.en: The measure of typography is the book.
sentences.cn: 量度字体编排设计的标尺是书.

sentences.en: The place where typography was probably invented in our country was the Huanghe river region.
sentences.cn: 我国发明版筑技术的地区应该是黄河流域.

sentences.en: This is why display cases are rarely found in the world of digital typography, whereas they were once common in letterpress printing.
sentences.cn: 这就是当今数字化排印领域中罕见特排字体的原因，虽然它们在凸版印刷的时代盛行一时。

sentences.en: Typography and concept will both play important roles in the work.
sentences.cn: 排印样式和概念在创作中将扮演同样重要的角色.

sentences.en: Typography is the art, craft and techniques of type design, modifying type glyphs, and arranging type.
sentences.cn: 印刷术是艺术, 工艺和技术型的设计, 修改类型字形, 并安排类型.

sentences.en: Used to take the place of hyphen in many occasions when finer typography is required.
sentences.cn: 很多时,配合精细的排字要求,就用它来代替连字号.

sentences.en: You have good typography and layout skills and love a good challenge.
sentences.cn: 你要具良好的平面设计技巧,喜欢尝试新的挑战.

words.tran_cn: 排印错误；排字工；印刷工

trans.tran_cn: 凸版印刷术，排印，印刷样式
trans.tran_en: the work of preparing written material for printing
